title: Riot, I drew you a picture
body:
Riot,
I'm just 44 RP away from getting a mystery skin before the promotion ends... I see a lot of people draw you pictures to get that tiny bit of RP they need so I thought id give it a shot haha. So please Riot <3. If not at least the boards will enjoy some epic fanart!

replies.body: glad u guys enjoy this epic fanart!
Rito pls, give this man the RP
